description.short: Tool for recommending relevant U2U Courses to the user
description.full: Get a recommendation for U2U courses. Search by course content. This plugin works with Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365. Examples: Recommend a course about ASP.NET Core. Recommend a course about web development. Suggest me a course about T-SQL. I want to know more about AI, suggest a course.

parameters.name: Interests of the user
parameters.title: UserInterests
parameters.description: The topics the user is interested in as well as level of experience. Example: C# for a beginner developer.
